subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3468 is on the way
description_text:
Hi, I received the order, but the control box is missing. Was there supposed to be another package for the control box or was it just forgotten? Picture attached of received goods. Br, Emil Hanelius Sent from iPhone SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> kirjoitti 15.11.2025 kello 13.38: ﻿

conversations.body_text: Hi Emil Hanelius,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our warehouse staff has confirmed that an item was indeed omitted from your shipment. We will arrange for a replacement to be sent to you immediately.
